<div align="justify"><font size="2" style="FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>

<div align="justify"><font size="2" style="FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 3pt">&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>&#160;Kroger has a variety of plans under which employees may acquire common shares of Kroger. Employees of Kroger and its subsidiaries own shares through a profit sharing plan, as well as 401(k) plans and a payroll deduction plan called the Kroger Stock Exchange. If employees have questions concerning their shares in the Kroger Stock Exchange, or if they wish to sell shares they have purchased through this plan, they should contact:</font></div>

<div>&#160;</div>

<div align="center">
<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="20%" style="BORDER-COLLAPSE: collapse; ">
<tr valign="bottom">

Employee Investment Plans Division<br>
P. O. Box 7090<br>
Troy, MI 48007-7090<br>
Toll Free 1-800-872-3307</font></td>
</tr></table>
</div>

<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" style="">
<tr>
<td width="100%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 1pt solid">&#160; </td>
</tr></table>

<div align="justify"><font size="2" style="FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>

<div align="justify"><font size="2" style="FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Questions regarding Kroger&#8217;s 401(k) plans should be directed to the employee&#8217;s Human Resources Department or 1-800-2KROGER. Questions concerning any of the other plans should be directed to the employee&#8217;s Human Resources Department.</font></div>

<div align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">YOUR VOTE IS IMPORTANT. PLEASE VOTE TODAY.</font></font></div>

<div>&#160;</div>

<div align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">We encourage you to take advantage of Internet or telephone voting.<br>
Both are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.</font></font></div>

<div>&#160;</div>

<div align="center"><font size="2" style="FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Internet and telephone voting is available through 11:59 PM Eastern Time June 22, 2011.</font></div>

<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="95%" style="PADDING-RIGHT: 5pt; PADDING-LEFT: 5pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 5pt; PADDING-TOP: 5pt; ">

<td width="100%" style="BORDER-RIGHT: #000000 1pt dashed; BORDER-TOP: #000000 1pt dashed; BORDER-LEFT: #000000 1pt dashed; BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 1pt dashed; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font size="2" style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">ADMISSION TICKET</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center">&#160;</div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font size="2" style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">If you plan to attend the annual meeting of shareholders, please bring this card with you as it serves as your admission ticket. This ticket admits only the shareholder(s) listed on the reverse side and is not transferable.</font></div>

</tr></table>

<div style="PADDING-RIGHT: 30pt; PADDING-LEFT: 30pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic"><font size="4" style="FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">You can now access your account online for shares in The Kroger Co.</font></font></font></div>

<div>&#160;</div>

<div style="PADDING-RIGHT: 30pt; PADDING-LEFT: 30pt" align="justify"><font size="2" style="FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Access your account online via Investor ServiceDirect</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: text-top"><font size="2" style="FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#174;</font></font> <font size="2" style="FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(ISD).</font></div>

<div>&#160;</div>

<div style="PADDING-RIGHT: 30pt; PADDING-LEFT: 30pt" align="justify"><font size="2" style="FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">BNY Mellon Shareowner Services, the transfer agent for The Kroger Co., now makes it easy and convenient to get current information on your shareholder account.</font></div>

<div>&#160;</div>

<div align="center">
<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="70%" style="">
<tr>
<td valign="top" width="50%">
<ul>
<li><font size="2" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">View account status</font> </li>

<li><font size="2" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">View certificate history</font> </li>

<li><font size="2" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">View book-entry information</font> </li>
</ul>
</td>
<td valign="top" width="50%">
<ul>
<li><font size="2" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">View payment history for dividends</font> </li>

<li><font size="2" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Make address changes</font> </li>

<li><font size="2" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">Obtain a duplicate 1099 tax form</font> </li>
</ul>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>

<div align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic"><font size="2" style="FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Visit us on the web at http://www.bnymellon.com/shareowner/equityaccess<br>
For Technical Assistance Call 1-877-978-7778 between 9am-7pm<br>
Monday-Friday Eastern Time</font></font></font></div>

<div>&#160;</div>

<div align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><font size="2" style="FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Investor ServiceDirect</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: text-top"><font style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial">&#174;<br>

</font></font></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><font size="2" style="FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">TOLL FREE NUMBER: 1-800-370-1163</font></font></div>

<div align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><font size="2" style="FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">This Proxy is Solicited on Behalf of the Board of Directors<br>
for the Annual Meeting to be Held on June 23, 2011</font></font></div>

<div>&#160;</div>

<div align="justify">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font size="2" style="FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The undersigned hereby appoints each of DAVID B. DILLON, JOHN T. LA MACCHIA and BOBBY S. SHACKOULS or if more than one is present and acting then a majority thereof, proxies, with full power of substitution and revocation, to vote the common shares of The Kroger Co. that the undersigned is entitled to vote at the annual meeting of shareholders, and at any adjournment thereof, with all the powers the undersigned would possess if personally present, including authority to vote on the matters shown on the reverse in the manner directed, and upon any other matter that properly may come before the meeting. The undersigned hereby revokes any proxy previously given to vote those shares at the meeting or at any adjournment.</font></div>

<div>&#160;</div>

<div align="justify">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><font size="2" style="FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The proxies are directed to vote as specified on the reverse hereof and in their discretion on all other matters coming before the meeting. Except as specified to the contrary on the reverse, the shares represented by this proxy will be voted FOR all nominees listed, FOR Proposals 2, 3 and 5, for the option EVERY 3 YEARS on Proposal 4, and AGAINST Proposal 6.</font></font></div>

<div>&#160;</div>

<div align="justify">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font size="2" style="FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">If you wish to vote in accordance with the recommendations of the Board of Directors, all you need do is sign and return this card. The Proxy Committee cannot vote your shares unless you vote your proxy by Internet or telephone or sign and return the card.</font></div>
